pullrequest.title: Allow conversion from lat/lon to local coordinates

content.raw: It's a little confusing that the description says the function converts to a global Gazebo Cartesian frame vector, but the doxygen of the input parameter already says this is a Cartesian's vector in Gazebo's world frame, and also the name of the function (LocalFromGlobal) implies is going to return a Local reference frame.
content.html: It's a little confusing that the description says the function converts to a global Gazebo Cartesian frame vector, but the doxygen of the input parameter already says this is a Cartesian's vector in Gazebo's world frame, and also the name of the function (LocalFromGlobal) implies is going to return a Local reference frame.
